topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5355e1816368720ad8270000#post_5355e1816368720ad8270000
It's from 1988, and it served as a promotion for a toyline. It's about these people from the future and their alien foes who end up in the age of the dinosaurs. They then use the dinosaurs as weapons against each other. Only one season was made, with fourteen episodes.

It's the source of these two popular images:
!http://longgonebutnotforgotten.files.wordpress.com/2010/09/dinoriders1.jpg!
!http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eZZFFmFMzrQ/TicTrJtX81I/AAAAAAAAArw/6FrIHRO1aUE/s1600/dinoriders1.jpg!
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body: "So I'm just gonna leave this here because it's fucking hilarious.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EID4kh9QfT4
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5355e26f6368727739f80000#post_5355e26f6368727739f80000

Watched the first episode in youtube. What I watched is a futuristic He-Man and the Star Trek crew in the TerraNova series.

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5355e7406368721a782c0000#post_5355e7406368721a782c0000

topics.body:
After much research, and from my personal observations on eBay, I must conclude that the Chaos Effect Mobile Command Center repaint is the rarest _Jurassic Park_ toy, apart from some unreleased toys (unless my hypothesis that the Ultimasaurus had an extremely limited release is true).
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/vehicles/mcc/img/package_front_lowres.jpg!
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/vehicles/mcc/img/package_back_lowres.jpg!
Another possible competitor is the Omega _T. rex_ from the same toyline, which is also a repaint.
!http://www.jplegacy.org/toys/jpcetoys/omega.jpg!
!http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110118184841/jurassicpark/images/f/f7/Omega_t-rex_productshot.jpg!
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5355f243636872621db20100#post_5355f243636872621db20100
[bq="Randomosaur"]
!http://www.jplegacy.org/toys/jpcetoys/omega.jpg!
!http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110118184841/jurassicpark/images/f/f7/Omega_t-rex_productshot.jpg!
[/bq]
It's Greymon!
